thread.title: Burkina Faso Hit by Suspected Islamist Attack

author: Joe Parkinson
title: Burkina Faso Hit by Suspected Islamist Attack
text:
Suspected Islamist gunmen launched coordinated attacks on the capital of Burkina Faso on Friday, with gunshots and explosions reverberating from a downtown district housing government offices, embassies and the military headquarters.
Seven Burkina Faso soldiers and eight Islamic extremists were killed in the attacks, the countryâ€™s communications minister Remy Danjuinou said on state TV, adding that the death toll for the soldiers is likely to climb as many others were seriously wounded.
